body: This looks like an error on our side. Reading the EnergyPlus error tells me that we need to use 359.9 and not 360 for the input. I added this to github ([https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/417](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/417)) and we will get back to you soon. Thank you for reporting.
